TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler(object? sender, NetworkAvailabilityEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As NetworkAvailabilityEventArgs)
type NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * NetworkAvailabilityEventArgs -> unit
public delegate void NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, NetworkAvailabilityEventArgs ^ e);
public delegate void NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler(object sender, NetworkAvailabilityEventArgs e);

Docs.param: An object that contains data about the event.
Docs.summary: References one or more methods to be called when the availability of the network changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This delegate handles <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged> events raised by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange> class. For detailed information on receiving notification for network interface address change events, see the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange> class overview documentation.
